minesweeper

Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • minesweeper.Board

  • public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
    Keeps track of the status of the gameBoard has 2 int[][] arrays, 1 for tile status and 1 for boardData keeps count of bombAmount, Size and used flags
